name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sapi - Finds time to read online articles.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find time to read on online articles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop wondering if an article will take too much of your time.

Sapi tells you how long it will take to read an article based on a personalized reading score.

If you have any issues at all, don't hesitate to email me directly at info@emmanuelmark.guru.
